title: Congress says "PM Modi keeps saying Congress is against Women's Reservation Bill, but let me remind you that in 1989 when Rajiv Gandhi proposed this bill, it was opposed by BJP leaders namely Atal Vajpayee, LK Advani. This bill could have passed at that time but it was opposed by their leaders"
